## Conversion.Converters.FieldTransformers type

Per-property converters and configuration for each field in the destination object of a [Converters.transformObject()](./ts-utils.converters.transformobject.md) call.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldTransformers<TSRC, TDEST, TC = unknown> = {
    [key in keyof TDEST]: {
        from: keyof TSRC;
        converter: Converter<TDEST[key], TC> | Validator<TDEST[key], TC>;
        optional?: boolean;
    };
};
```
**References:** [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->, [Validator](./ts-utils.validator.md)
